Macros.MustControlActor: Необходимо контролировать персонажа для использования этого макроса.
Macros.AvailableSkills: Выберите навык для проверки с ограничением
Macros.NotAGM: Вы должны быть ведущим для использования этого макроса!
Macros.GenerateScrollLoading: Загрузка заклинаний для генерации магического свитка

Cant.UseWomChannelling: Для использования напевов концентрация по правилам WoM должна быть включена в настройках.
Cant.NotEnoughSL: У {actor} недостаточно накопленных УУ, чтобы школа {lore} использовала макрос напевов {macro}. Накоплено {SL} из {requiredSL}.

CheckStatus.NoActorsFound: Актёр не найден в предоставленных папках.
CheckStatus.Name: Имя

Actors.InputMoneyFormula: Введите формулу броска для случайных денег (в медных пенни)
Actors.ShouldRollTokenContent: Случайно сгенерировать характеристики, навыки и таланты {name}, основываясь на его народе {species}?

CombatFatigue.CombatFatigueTestFailure: Наваливается усталость. Следующая проверка будет совершена через РВ раундов.
CombatFatigue.CombatFatigueTestSuccess: Усталость отступает! Следующая проверка будет совершена через РВ+УУ раундов.
CombatFatigue.CombatFatigueToolTip: Боевая усталость - раундов до проверки стойкости
CombatFatigue.CombatPassOutToollTip: Боевая усталость - раундов до потери сознания

ItemRepair.MustControlActor: Необходимо контролировать персонажа, чьи предметы вы хотите отремонтировать.
ItemRepair.Repaired: Вы починили {name}. Уберите {repaired} урона у предмета.
ItemRepair.NoActorSelected: Вы должны выбрать актёра для починки предметов.
ItemRepair.NoItemsToRepair: У вас нет повреждённых предметов, которые вы могли-бы починить.
ItemRepair.WeaponIsMangled: Weapon is mangled beyond recognition. It's treated now as an Improvised Weapon and can't normally be repaired.
ItemRepair.ItemIsMangled: This item is mangled beyond recognition and can't normally be repaired.
ItemRepair.ArmourReceivedDamageTotal: {name} has received {damage} points of damage across all of its locations.
ItemRepair.ItemReceivedDamageOutOfMax: {name} has received {damage} points of damage out of maximum {maxDamage} it can sustain.
ItemRepair.RepairingWillCostPerDamageAndTotal: Repairing this item will cost {perDamage} per damage for a total of {total}.

Runes.RemovedEffectTemporaryRuneDisabled: Removed "{effectName}" effect from Actor "{actorName}" and Item "{itemName}". It was Temporary Rune that got disabled.
Runes.AndGotUnequipped: and got unequipped because of it
Runes.ItsNowImprovisedWeapon: it's now considered an Improvised Weapon
Runes.ArmourCouldNotBeDamagedMore: Броня больше не может быть повреждена
Runes.ArmourReceived1DamageOnLocation: Броня получила 1 пункт урона в зоне {locationName}
Runes.MustSelectATarget: You must select a target for {rune}.
Runes.TargetNotInRange: Selected target is not in range for {rune}. Must be within {range} yards.

RuneOfFate.name: Руна судьбы
RuneOfFate.effect: negated all incoming Damage, because you would drop down to 0 Wounds.

RuneOfFury.name: Rune of Fury
RuneOfFury.effect: вы можете потратить преимущество или оставшееся движение для совершения дополнительной атаки.

RuneOfGrudges.name: Rune of Grudges
RuneOfGrudges.effect: On the first Round of Combat, nominate an enemy as the Target of this Rune. For the remainder of the Combat, you can reroll all failed attacks against the Target.
RuneOfGrudges.description: Character wielding weapon Engraved with this Rune can, on the first Round of Combat, nominate an enemy as the Target of this Rune. For the remainder of the Combat, you can reroll all failed attacks against the Target.

RuneOfLuck.name: Rune of Luck
RuneOfLuck.effect: While this Item is equipped, gain 1 level of {luck} Talent.

RuneOfLuckTemporary.name: Rune of Luck (Temporary)
RuneOfLuckTemporary.effect: You can activate this Rune as an alternative or equivalent to using a Fortune point.
RuneOfLuckTemporary.effectActivated: Rune has been activated, you gain one of the effects of a Fortune point.

RuneOfIron.name: Rune of Iron
RuneOfIron.effect: Reduces all incoming Damage by 1, even if it ignores AP.

RuneOfMight.name: Rune of Might
RuneOfMight.effect: SB doubled against enemies with TB equal to or higher than 5.

RuneOfResistance.name: Rune of Resistance
RuneOfResistance.effect: Should you receive damage from an attack or effect that ignores AP and TB, you can perform a Toughness Test with -5 modifier for each Wound you are about to suffer. If you succeed, you suffer no Wounds.

RuneOfSpeed.name: Rune of Speed
RuneOfSpeed.effect: Character wielding weapon Engraved with this Rune adds a +1d10 to their Initiative Score during the Combat.

RuneOfSpellbreaking.name: Rune of Spellbreaking
RuneOfSpellbreaking.effect: Use to immediately end any persistent spell within 12 yards. Additionally, if you are a Runesmith, you can instead attempt to Dispel any incoming spell and gain +20 modifier to that attempt. Activating this rune takes an Action.

RuneOfSpelleating.name: Rune of Spelleating
RuneOfSpelleating.effect: Use to immediately end any persistent spell within 12 yards. Additionally, if you are a Runesmith, you can instead attempt to Dispel any incoming spell and gain +20 modifier to that attempt. If you succeed, the opposing caster can’t use that spell again within the next 24 hours. Activating this rune takes an Action.

MasterRuneOfBreaking.name: Master Rune of Breaking
MasterRuneOfBreaking.effect: you may perform an Opposed Strength Test against your opponent. If you win, your opponent’s weapon breaks.

MasterRuneOfDismay.name: Master Rune of Dismay
MasterRuneOfDismay.effect: All enemies within 24 yards of the user must make a Willpower Test or suffer a @Condition[Stunned]{Stunned} Condition. Activation takes an Action, can only be used once per Encounter.

MasterRuneOfSpite.name: Master Rune of Spite
MasterRuneOfSpite.effect: Reduces all incoming Damage by 2, even if it ignores AP.

MasterRuneOfSteel.name: Master Rune of Steel
MasterRuneOfSteel.effect: Non-magical weapons gain Undamaging flaw when striking wearer of this Armour.

Tutor.Name: Tutor
Tutor.Effect: increased AP when struck by a bigger enemy by the amount proportional to difference in size ({num}).

Arrows.applySlashing.EnableHint: If enabled, successful hits with Slashing weapon on part protected by no more than 1 AP will automatically add Bleeding Condition
Arrows.SlashingApplied:
{hitLocation} Hit Location is protected by no more than 1 AP, applying Bleed condition.
{bleedAmtOld} -> {bleedAmt}
Arrows.ChatArrowsRecovered: {name} found and recovered {qty} {ammoName}s that can be reused.

Blinding.Label: Ослепляющее
Blinding.Description: A Blinding X weapon inflicts X @Condition[Blinded] Conditions to enemy hit.
Blinding.Message: Blinding weapon was used! {rating} Blinded Conditions received.

Incendiary.Label: Incendiary
Incendiary.Description: An Incendiary X weapon inflicts one @Condition[Ablaze] Condition on hit, as long as unit die on the Weapon Test rolled less than or equal X.
Incendiary.Message: Incendiary weapon was used and unit die ({die}) rolled less than or equal {rating}! Ablaze Condition received.

Slashing.Label: Slashing
Slashing.Description: A weapon with Slashing X inflicts one @Condition[Bleeding] Condition on a successful hits on locations protected by no more than X Armour Points.
Slashing.Message: {location} is protected by only {ap} Armour Points, not enough to protect against Slashing {rating}. Bleeding Condition received.

Poisonous.Label: Poisonous
Poisonous.Description: A weapon with Poisonous X inflicts one @Condition[Poisoned] Condition whenever attacker scores at least X SL on Weapon Test.
Poisonous.Message: Attacker's Weapon Test scored {sl} SL, which is greater than or equal to Poisonous rating ({rating}). Poisoned Condition received.

Recoverable.Label: Recoverable
Recoverable.Description:
Projectile can be recovered even if it's ammunition group normally cannot.
(requires feature enabled in settings)

Unrecoverable.Label: Unrecoverable
Unrecoverable.Description: Projectile always perishes and can never be recovered.

Sturdy.Label: Sturdy
Sturdy.Description:
Projectile is sturdy and easier to recover.
Percentage rules: rolls double, picks lower
Success/Fail rules: negates success/failure condition
Other rules: if not recovered, roll for Percentage.
(requires feature enabled in settings)

Frail.Label: Frail
Frail.Description:
Projectile is very frail and easily breaks making it harder to recover.
Percentage rules: rolls double, picks higher
Other rules: if not recovered, roll for Percentage
(requires feature enabled in settings)

HardToFind.Label: Hard To Find
HardToFind.Description: Projectile is very hard to find even in favorable conditions. If it was to be recovered, roll again for Percentage with –10 modifier.

Grimoires.DropHere: Перетащите заклинания сюда для добавления в гримуар

CheckCareer.CurrentCareerLevel: Это ступень {careerLevel} карьеры, поэтому требуемое число шагов развития - {requiredAdvances}.
CheckCareer.CheckBelow: Проверьте ниже, достаточно ли у вас шагов развития, чтобы завершить карьеру.
CheckCareer.YouHaveEnoughAdvances: У вас достаточношагов развития для завершения карьеры!

Potential.PostLink: которые могут быть частью вашей карьеры.

CheckCareer.ConclusionCannot: Вы не можете завершить сейчас карьеру.
CheckCareer.ConclusionCan: Поздравляем! Вы можете завершить вашу текущую карьеру!
CheckCareer.ConclusionPotential: Если у вас есть 'потенциальные' навыки и/или таланты, скажите своему ведущему. Они могут повлиять на вашу карьеру!
CheckCareer.HasSpareExp: У вас есть {exp} опыта, который вы можете потратить.

Effects.NotEnoughAdvances: У вас недостаточно шагов развития для запуска эффекта "{effect}"! У вас {advances} шагов развития, а эффект требует {required}.
Effects.NotEnoughAdvantage: You do not have enough Advantage to spend on {name} action. You have {have} and need {need}.

Assault.Name: Steelstorm Assault
Assault.Description: {character} spends 2 Advantage to perform a Bonus Action with any Initiative value

AllIn.Name: Going All In
AllIn.Description: {character} goes All In, gaining +20 modifier to all attacks until the start of their next turn. However, during this time, all attacks aimed at this character will be Unopposed.
AllIn.Mastery: Because of Mastery, non-Damaging weapons become Damaging, while Damaging weapons become Impact instead

Bracing.Name: Bracing
Bracing.Description:
{character} is Bracing against incoming attacks, gaining +20 modifier to all defensive Weapon Tests.
While Bracing, character can only move using their Walk speed and they are unable to perform any Actions (Free Actions are up to GM).
Bracing ends the moment character initiates an Attack.
Bracing.Reminder: {character} is Bracing against incoming attacks and can only Move using Walk speed and cannot perform Actions.

Riposte.Name: Ironshield Riposte
Riposte.Description: {character} may spend 2 Advantage. If they do, they can immediately attack their attacker as a Free Action. This attack does not end Brace.
Riposte.Mastery: Additionally, thanks to Mastery, Ironshield Riposte can receive one of the following effects: Cause 1 @Condition[Bleeding], perform a "Strike to Stun" with your shield, or give –10 modifier to defend against the riposte.

Disengage.Name: Shrewd Disengage
Disengage.Description: {character} may, once per Encounter, safely Disengage without spending Advantage.

LuckyEvadecraft.Name: Lucky Evadecraft
LuckyEvadecraft.Description: Attacker scored a critical hit! {character} may spend a Fortune Point to force the Attacker to reroll their attack.

ShrewdTrickery.Name: Shrewd Trickery
ShrewdTrickery.Description: {character} can perform Trick ability with +10 modifier. Winning by 4 SL or more will award 2 Advantage instead of 1.

Mastery.NoTarget: You need to target a token in order to Learn Moves!
Mastery.AlreadyLearned: You already learned moves from this opponent!
Mastery.LearnedMovesDescription: {character} spent their entire Action, studying their opponent's movement. Until the end of this Encounter, gain +10 modifier to all Weapon and Dodge Tests to attack or defend against this opponent.

WorldTimeObserver.NotAFunction: Passed `callable` argument is not a Function
WorldTimeObserver.NotAnInteger: Passed `{arg}` argument is not an Integer, or is of invalid value
WorldTimeObserver.NotAnObject: Passed `args` argument is not an Object
WorldTimeObserver.LoopError: Somehow, impossible happened. ID generating loop hit an upper limit of attempts. Check console (F12) for details.
WorldTimeObserver.CallbackError: There was an Error when executing a Callback. Check the console (F12) for details.

Scrolls.DropHere: Перетащите заклинание сюда, чтобы прикрепить его
Scrolls.MacroCantFind: Could not find a Spell of „{lore}” Lore and maximum CN of {maxCN}.
Scrolls.ChangeScrollDescription: This will also replace Scroll's Description!
Scrolls.ActorCanNotUse: {actor} can't use the „{scroll}”. Either there are no scrolls left, or Actor does not know „Language ({language})”.
Scrolls.ItemNotFound: Something went wrong. Dropped Item was not found!
Scrolls.MustHaveSource: Spell must have a source in, or originate from, World or Compendium in order to create a Scroll!
Scrolls.NotASpell: Only Spells can be inscribed on a Scroll!
Scrolls.MustHaveLore: Only Spells with Lore can be inscribed on a Scroll!

Vertigo.Name: Vertigo
Vertigo.Description: You have trouble staying balanced and feel the sensation of spinning around. All Weapon Tests, as well as Tests based on either Agility, Dexterity, or Intelligence suffer a penalty of -2 SL while you are dizzy.
Vertigo.Treatment: There is no treatment available for Vertigo, this symptom ends when the cause of it ends.

Scarring.Name: Scarring
Scarring.Description: You have been horribly scarred by your ordeal and your appearance unsettles or disgusts others. As a result you suffer a -10 penalty to all Fellowship Tests.
Scarring.Treatment: Scarring is usually permanent barring special magic.

Rashes.Name: Rashes
Rashes.Description: You have numerous red, itchy rashes. As a result your appearance is slightly marred and you lose some of your deftness as you scratch and squirm. Receive a -5 modifier to your Dexterity and Fellowship Characteristics.
Rashes.Treatment: Depending on the disease some herbs and alchemical mixes can alleviate rashes. Of course there are also many fake remedies available for sale that do nothing and a purchased treatment has a 10% chance of being snake-oil. Treatments cost from 10 brass pennies and upwards depending on the status of the purchaser and the reputation of the seller. Anyone with Trade (Apothecary) or Trade (Alchemist) with access to appropriate ingredients (costing 5 pennies) can create enough salve that when applied daily can alleviate the symptoms for a week.

Taint.Name: Taint
Taint.Description: This disease is tainted by the powers of Chaos and affects the very soul of the suffering victim. Unless the victim passes a Challenging (+0) Endurance Test, they suffer 1 point of @UUID[JournalEntry.NS3YGlJQxwTggjRX.JournalEntryPage.115GzWrmkD4viyy5]{Corruption}.
Taint.Treatment: There is no treatment for the Taint.

Purblind.Name: Purblind
Purblind.Description: Your eyes have been afflicted causing them to swell and weep pus, blood or other fluids. You are blinded to a degree based on how severe it is. You suffer a -10 penalty to all sight-based attributes and skill checks including attacks. This penalty rises to -20 for Moderate, and -30 for Severe levels of affliction.
Purblind.Treatment: This symptom lasts until the source of it has been dealt with. Cold cloths with a mix of medicinal herbs can be applied over the eyes to help relieve some of the pressure, but that will not help with the loss of sight.

Wasting.Name: Wasting
Wasting.Description: This disease has attacked and atrophied your muscles and ligaments. As the disease progresses you are gradually wasting away and suffer from a -10 penalty to your Strength, Agility, Toughness and Dexterity, as well as all Weapon Tests. This penalty grows to -20 for Moderate and -30 for Severe. Any victim whose Toughness is reduced to 0 eventually dies from the disease as it runs its course.
Wasting.Treatment: Wasting can only be cured by addressing the underlying disease. A subject who is being cared for and well fed above their normal intake (Requiring a status expenditure of 2 Standing levels higher than your career) can make a weekly Difficult (-10) Endurance Test to temporarily reduce the effect by 10 for a week.

Dementia.Name: Dementia
Dementia.Description: The disease has influenced your cognitive faculties. Your ability to think clearly, reason, or remember is adversely affected and you suffer a -20 penalty to your Intelligence and -15 to your Initiative.
Dementia.Treatment: There is no known treatment for Dementia, and it lasts for the duration of the disease affecting your thinking capacity.

Settings.MenuHint: Откройте специальное окно, в котором будут показаны все настройки, разделённые на интуитивно понятные вкладки.

Actor.EnableHint:
При активации модуль будет случайно генерировать характеристики, когда ведущий вытягивает на карту токены, а также навыки и таланты, основываясь на народе.
Работает только для не привязанных токенов.
Actor.ModeHint: Выберите, всегда ли генерировать персонажей-токенов или следует спрашивать ведущего о каждом.
Actor.RollMoneyHint: При активации модуль будет случайно генерировать деньги токенов. Полезно при использовании модулей, подобных Item Piles.
Actor.DefaultMoneyHint: Формула броска используется для генерации случайного количества денег (в медных пенни).
Actor.MoneyModeHint: Выберите, следует ли всегда генерировать деньги с использованием формулы денег, или следует спрашивать ведущего о каждом случае.

Runes.EnableHint: If enabled, Items will get damaged when a Temporary Rune engraved on them is disabled/used.

Diseases.AutoProgressHint: При активации модуль автоматически отслеживает течение болезней актёров (требуется модуль отслеживания времени. Рекомендуется Simple Calendar).
Diseases.AutoProgressNoWorldTime: Мировое время не установлено. Пожалуйста, активируйте и настройте модуль отслеживания времени (например Simple Calendar), прежде чем включать автоматическое течение болезни.

Injuries.AutoProgressHint: При активации модуль автоматически следит за заживлением ран (требуется модуль отслеживания времени. Рекомендуется Simple Calendar).
Injuries.AutoProgressNoWorldTime: Мировое время не установлено. Пожалуйста, активируйте и настройте модуль отслеживания времени (например Simple Calendar), прежде чем включать автоматическое заживление ран.

ArrowReclamation.EnableHint: Enable ammo reclamation upon range weapon test roll. When used during an encounter some projectiles will be returned after encounter ends.
ArrowReclamation.RuleHint: Select rules by which decide if arrow can be reused. Word `critical` means both criticals and fumbles on the main Ranged Test roll.
ArrowReclamation.SuccessRule: Ranged Attack rolled even and was successful
ArrowReclamation.NoCritRule: Ranged Attack rolled even, but not critical
ArrowReclamation.SuccessNoCritRule: Ranged Attack rolled even, was successful, but not critical
ArrowReclamation.FailureRule: Ranged Attack rolled even and failed
ArrowReclamation.FailureNoCritRule: Ranged Attack rolled even, has failed, but not critical
ArrowReclamation.PercentageNoCritRule: Separate roll using Percentage, without criticals
ArrowReclamation.PercentageHint: Set target percentage for rolling with certain Rules. Roll will succeed if d100 rolls less or equal to Target

CombatFatigue.EnableHint: При активации модуль будет совершать проверки стойкости после РВ раундов, чтобы не подвергнуться усталости.
CombatFatigue.EnableNPCHint: Действуют ли правила боевой усталости на персонажей ведущего?
CombatFatigue.EnableCorePassOut: Включить потерю сознания согласно книге правил
CombatFatigue.EnableCorePassOutHint: Включите это для автоматической потери сознания согласно книге правил. Отключите, если используете правила Up in Arms.

CastingFatigue.EnableHint: Should Casting Fatigue feature be enabled?
CastingFatigue.CostOfChannelingHint: How much ME is spent when attempting Channeling?
CastingFatigue.NegativeMEPerStepHint: For every negative X, the difficulty of Endurance Test will increase. So a value of 5 will mean that Test becomes difficult on -5, hard on -10 etc.
CastingFatigue.UseBaseCNHint: If checked, ME spent will be equal to spell's base CN. Otherwise, "effective CN" will be used (reduced by Channeling SL)
CastingFatigue.MaxMEHint: How should maximum amount of Magical Endurance be calculated for a character?
CastingFatigue.AutoRegenHint: If checked, module will regenerate Actors' ME automatically (Requires a time tracking module. Simple Calendar is recommended).
CastingFatigue.AutoRegenNoWorldTime: WorldTime hasn't been set. Please activate and configure a time tracking module (for example, Simple Calendar) before enabling Automated Regeneration.

Scrolls.AllowOvercastingHint: Should spells cast from Scrolls be able to be overcast?
Scrolls.DifficultyMagickHint: What should be default difficulty for Scrolls written in Language (Magick)?
Scrolls.DifficultyHint: What should be default difficulty for Scrolls written in Language other than Magick?
Scrolls.OwnCategoryHint: Should scrolls appear in inventory as their own, separate group? If false, they will be attached to Books and Documents. (client-side setting)
Scrolls.MagicalEnduranceHint: How much ME should using Scrolls cost? Requires Casting Fatigue feature enabled. Set to 0 to disable.
Scrolls.UpdateNameHint: Should Scroll's name be automatically updated whenever a new Spell is attached to the Scroll?
Scrolls.ReplaceDescriptionHint: Should Scroll's description also be updated along with the Name?
Scrolls.DefaultEncumbranceHint: Select what default Encumbrance for Magic Scroll items should be. Remember that Encumbrance is representing both weight and volume.
Scrolls.DefaultAvailabilityHint: Select what default Availability for Magic Scroll items should be.

Grimoires.RequireEquippedHint: Should spells from Grimoires be only transferred to Actor and available for Casting, when Grimoire is equipped? If false, spells are transferred when Grimoire is being added to Actor.
Grimoires.TransferWithoutLoreHint: Should spells from Grimoires be transferred even if Actor does not know respective „Arcane Magic (Lore)” Talent?
Grimoires.RequireReadWriteHint: Hides spells from Grimoires and prevent their transfer if character doesn't know how to Read.
Grimoires.HideSpellsWithoutLanguageHint: Hides spells from Grimoires and prevent their transfer if character doesn't know language in which the Grimoire is written.
Grimoires.OwnCategoryHint: Should Grimoires appear in inventory as their own, separate group? If false, they will be attached to Books and Documents. (client-side setting)
Grimoires.DefaultEncumbranceHint: Select what default Encumbrance for Grimoire items should be. Remember that Encumbrance is representing both weight and volume.
Grimoires.DefaultAvailabilityHint: Select what default Availability for Grimoire items should be.

ATL.ResetPresetsHint: When checked, this module will set ATL presets to be more in line with WFRP rules and to work with Light items from Forien's Armoury Compendium

ItemPiles.SetCurrenciesHint: When checked, this module will set Item Pile's currencies to use all of custom coins provided with Forien's Armoury. However, it is not suggested to use all 10 coins together as default.
ItemPiles.RolltablesImportHint: When checked, system will reimport all Merchant RollTables for Item Piles integration. WARNING: this will purge all contents of "Merchant Rolltables" folder!

Properties.EnabledHint: Should the Armoury add additional properties, like Incendiary, Blinding, Poisonous etc.?

Promo.Promo1: Hello! I'm Forien, an author of this module. Please accept my thanks for installing and using my Armoury, it means a lot to me. I hope you are enjoying all the features and content this module provides and that it enhances your game!
Promo.Promo2: If you have any suggestions or request, feel free to contact me on Discord, or drop an "Issue" on GitHub. You can find links below.
Promo.Promo3: If you enjoy this module and would like to support its development, please consider becoming a Patreon supporter, or tipping via Ko-Fi.
